comments:
Build ID:  I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
1. compile a C project in release mode under XP/MINGW
2. click on the + symbol in the C/C++ Project View near an .o file in Release directory

This message appears:

An internal error occurred during: "FetchJob".
java.lang.NullPointerException


More information:
In debug mode and in debug dir all is ok.
Please provide the stack-trace for the NullPointerException. You can find it in the log-file (workspace/.metadata/.log).

> Please provide the stack-trace for the NullPointerException. You can find it in
> the log-file (workspace/.metadata/.log).
